import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import Aos from "aos"; import "aos/dist/aos.css"; export default function About() { useEffect(() => { Aos.init({ duration: 2000, useClassNames: true, initClassName: false, animatedClassName: "animated", }); }); return (

LET ME INTRODUCE MYSELF







👋 Hello there! I'm Vijay Kumar Singh, a passionate and self-taught Frontend Developer with more than 2.5 years of experience in the world of web and mobile app development.

🚀 Over these years, I've had the privilege of working on more than 10 products, spanning a wide range of industries and technologies. From crafting intuitive user interfaces to optimizing website performance, I'm deeply committed to delivering exceptional user experiences.

💼 My experience includes collaborating with cross-functional teams, translating design concepts into pixel-perfect code, and ensuring seamless functionality across various devices and browsers. I thrive in fast-paced environments and take pride in my ability to adapt to new challenges.

🌐 In my career so far, I've had the opportunity to contribute to both web applications and mobile apps, gaining a well-rounded understanding of frontend development. I'm particularly passionate about staying up-to-date with the latest frontend trends and technologies to ensure my projects are at the cutting edge of innovation.

🎵 When I'm not coding, I immerse myself in the world of music, finding inspiration in its rhythm. I also love exploring new places, seeking adventure in every corner.{" "}

🤝 I'm always open to networking, collaborating on exciting projects, and learning from fellow developers and industry professionals. Let's connect, share our experiences, and create amazing digital experiences together! Feel free to reach out to me at singhvijay8529@gmail.com or connect with me here on LinkedIn.{" "}

); }
